hero.name: Lucas
hero.description: Driven by creative problem-solving and a passion for Data Privacy & AI, I'm a Fullstack Software Engineer crafting secure and scalable solutions for millions of users.

about.title: About Me
about.paragraph1: I'm a creative and communicative software engineer working since 2018. I specialize in backend development and am passionate about data privacy and security. I constantly evolve and quickly adapt to new challenges in my professional journey.
about.paragraph2: Throughout my career, I've worked with diverse technologies - from developing complex APIs to web and mobile frontend applications. I've also gained experience with DevOps and Cloud computing. As a technical leader, I focus on improving team deliveries and agile methodologies.
about.paragraph3: Beyond my development work, I co-hosted "Entre Chaves", a podcast for the developer community. I'm passionate about mentoring developers and have participated in team hiring and planning processes.

devpro.title: Software Engineer
devpro.description: Working with a highly technical and senior team on a global product impacting millions of users. International collaboration with team members from diverse countries, focusing on complex technical challenges, performance improvements, and high-level technical refinement.

starbucks.name: Starbucks
starbucks.description: Responsible for integrating Starbucks stores across the US and Canada with all major delivery partners, ensuring seamless order and delivery operations at scale.

dti.description: Led technical teams as Squad Leader and Technical Reference, driving security chapter leadership, co-hosting software development podcast, and participating in strategic planning. Supported hiring processes and mentored new team leads.

bancoInter.description: Squad Leader developing microservices with Java 17 and Micronaut. Extensive use of GitHub Copilot, legacy system migration, AWS Cloud management, and technical architecture planning.

valeGeotec.description: Led VALE's dam monitoring platform development. Built Flutter mobile app, Angular frontend, and Java Spring Boot microservices. Optimized performance by +400%, saved over 1M reais in Azure costs, achieved 99% system stability.

valeGcm.name: VALE - GCM
valeGcm.description: Developed VALE's medical contingency portal during COVID-19 pandemic. Full-stack development with Angular frontend and C# .NET backend in urgent project context.

bancoBS2.name: Banco BS2
bancoBS2.description: Full-stack developer building microservices with C# .NET 3.1 and Vue.js frontend. Implemented Azure Cloud solutions and Azure Functions using agile methodologies.

privacyByDesign.title: Implementing Privacy by Design to Reimagine Privacy on Instagram
privacyByDesign.excerpt: This academic work explores the implementation of Privacy by Design principles to reimagine privacy controls on Instagram, addressing the challenges of data protection in social media platforms.

aiAbstraction.title: Abstraction and Technological Evolution: The Journey from Binary to Artificial Intelligence üí°üß†
aiAbstraction.excerpt: In the constantly evolving world of software development, we are always creating new layers of abstraction to facilitate developers' work in building systems. This journey begins with electric current that passes information through binary codes, and extends to machine languages, programming languages, frameworks, and finally, low code and no code platforms.

enzimasPrivacy.title: Enzimas #200 - The risks and challenges of lack of Digital Privacy
enzimasPrivacy.excerpt: Have you watched the documentary 'The Social Dilemma' and been intrigued by the power your data can have in the hands of third parties? To talk about the importance of privacy and control of your data, we invited Lucas Campregher, Developer at dti digital, to discuss the topic both from the user's perspective and from those who build the solution. Press Play!

techshotPrivacy.title: Data Privacy: From individual to code
techshotPrivacy.excerpt: In this techshot, we will contemplate various concepts about the universe of data privacy! We will talk about cybersecurity and LGPD; in addition to demonstrating the application of security in software engineering in real cases!

techshotWallE.title: Wall-e Case: how we improved a legacy system by 93%
techshotWallE.excerpt: Leaving aside the theoretical and superficial parts, in this techshot we will present a real success case when working with evolutions in a legacy system. Based on performance log analysis and technical development proposals, we optimized process performance by 93%.

socialDilemma.title: The Social Dilemma: A necessary conversation
socialDilemma.excerpt: Harari's ideas show that society's current relationship with data flows is the main cause of the disinformation problem and the biggest challenges faced in the world today, leading us to conceptualize the social media dilemma.
